page.title: 06LEISURE ACTIVITIES(1)
page.content: There are many activities for young people. There is a{Scout Group,Guide {Company and Youth Club,}all of which meet in the Village hall in Marsh Gibbon.The churches have special childrens services and the United Reformed Church has a{Young Peoples {Fellowship.}There is a{Short Tennis {club}and during the summer holiday swimming is organised in the school pool.Many children take riding lessons at the local stables. Sporting activities include{cricket {and football teams and tennis and {badminton clubs. For those wishing for less strenuous activities there is the{Womens {Institute}and a thriving{Horticultural {society. There are three areas of allotments .
